hymn.title: Lord, for me You left Your glory

layout.singingstanza: Lord, for me You left Your glo -- ry, And be -- came a low -- ly man, For me tast -- ed Cal -- v'ry's suf -- fr'ing, Bore the bur -- den of my sin. Bound -- less as the sea, Grace I can't re -- pay; I would of -- fer all my love, Lord, Yours it is for aye.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, for me You left Your glory, And became a lowly man, For me tasted Calv'ry's suffr'ing, Bore the burden of my sin.
Boundless as the sea, Grace I can't repay; I would offer all my love, Lord, Yours it is for aye.
